sources.title: ChloeLoveIsCallingYou1934
sources.description: a voodoo woman living in the swamps is vengeful that white people lynched her husband. to get even she kidnapps the little girl of a nearby white family that she mistakingly feels responsible. years pass and the little girl-clohe,has grown up .she falls in love with a white man and plans to marry him..and there's is more to this strange story but I ain't tell ya...u gotta see it to believe it
